Class InitMap

    Class that parse all the maps from file

      • addTile

        private static Tile addTile(java.lang.String[] splitted)
        Read a string that contains information about the tile to create It sets the color of the tile, the coordinates, tha adjacents tile as one of DOOR, WALL, ENDOFMAP, HOLE and NEAR which meaning is easily understandable
        Parameters:
        splitted - the string to parse
        Returns:
        the tile created

        Returns:

      • addEnd

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> addEnd(java.lang.String[] splitted)
        Read a string that contains informations about the possible type of "end of game" of that map (for example sudden death or final frenzy)
        Parameters:
        splitted - the string to parse
        Returns:
        the list of end modes as strings

      • initMap

        public static java.util.List<MapInfo> initMap(java.lang.String fileName)
        Main method that initialize stuffs of reading and call the sub methods to create the various part of the maps, relating on the "identifiers" read
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to which read (only the name without / and with extension)
        Returns:
        the list of maps created
